main event: A UFO observation was reported near Las Cruces, New Mexico on 13 July 1957, involving a rapidly moving object detected by ground radar.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 5-6 minutes and was recorded on ground radar., The object appeared as a bright light moving in a straight line., The report discussed the possibility of the object being a balloon, an aircraft, or an astronomical phenomenon., The investigation was deemed inactive due to unreliable sources., The object was visually observed for several minutes before disappearing.
witness description: the observation was made from ground radar
